Arem

Korean: 아름

Hometown:

Daegu

Blood type:

Group (2019-present):
Rolling Quartz

Introduction

Arem is a South Korean bassist. She is a member of the rock band Rolling Quartz under Rolling Star Entertainment. Made her debut with Rolling Quartz on December 30, 2020 with the single "Blaze".

She is a former member of REDDOT and Rolling Girlz.
